rows.label: qst100406_msg0001
rows.name: Welcome, mo~â™ª

rows.label: qst100406_msg0002
rows.name:
Mo! It's you from before! Thank
you for your help back then, mo.

rows.label: qst100406_msg0003
rows.name:
Thanks to you, more customers
are coming to hear me sing, mo.

rows.label: qst100406_msg0004
rows.name:
But... it's hard to spread
the word through rumors with
just singing alone, mo...

rows.label: qst100406_msg0005
rows.name:
At this rate, the rumors of Falala
won't reach my son Solala, mo...

rows.label: qst100406_msg0006
rows.name: So! Falala has come up with a plan, mo!

rows.label: qst100406_msg0007
rows.name: Not just with Falala's singing...

rows.label: qst100406_msg0008
rows.name:
I'll add Falala's delicious
food to the rumors, mo!

rows.label: qst100406_msg0009
rows.name:
A restaurant where you can eat delicious
food while listening to the wonderful
singing voice of Mother Falala, mo!

rows.label: qst100406_msg0010
rows.name:
It should be easier for the
rumors to reach the ears of
Solala, who misses his mother, mo.

rows.label: qst100406_msg0011
rows.name:
Once that's decided, I'll start
cooking right away... momo!!

rows.label: qst100406_msg0012
rows.name:
I've run out of the ingredients
for my specialty dish, mo...

rows.label: qst100406_msg0013
rows.name:
I can't make it without Rhinon Tail
and Stra's Marbled Meat, mo...

rows.label: qst100406_msg0014
rows.name:
Neither of them are easy to
get at the exchange, so this
is a great help, mo!

rows.label: qst100406_msg0015
rows.name:
Rhinon Tail is easy to get in
Invidia, and Stra's Marbled Meat
should be easy to get in Gula, mo.

rows.label: qst100406_msg0101
rows.name:
Rhinon Tail can be obtained
from Nomad Rhinon in Invidia.

rows.label: qst100406_msg0102
rows.name:
Stra's Marbled Meat should be
obtainable from Meld Stra in Gula, mo.

rows.label: qst100406_msg0103
rows.name:
If you bring me both, Falala
will handle the rest, mo!

rows.label: qst100406_msg0201
rows.name:
Did you gather the ingredients
for the dish, mo?

rows.label: qst100406_msg0202
rows.name:
Thank you, mo! I'll make
it right away, mo!

rows.label: qst100406_msg0203
rows.name: It's ready, mo~! Spicy Stra Lushi, mo~!

rows.label: qst100406_msg0204
rows.name:
When Solala had a fever...
when he wet the bed... when
he was rejected by a girl...

rows.label: qst100406_msg0205
rows.name:
This is the dish I made for
him on those occasions, mo!

rows.label: qst100406_msg0206
rows.name:
So... I have a favor to ask of
you, since you travel so much.

rows.label: qst100406_msg0207
rows.name:
I made flyers to let people
know about my cooking, mo!

rows.label: qst100406_msg0208
rows.name:
I want you to stick these up on the
notice boards in the Central Exchange,
Torigo, and Fons Maim, mo.

rows.label: qst100406_msg0209
rows.name: Thank you, mo! I'm counting on you, mo!

rows.label: qst100406_msg0210
rows.name:
I'll prepare a lot in advance
so I'm ready for when the
customers come, mo!

rows.label: qst100406_msg0301
rows.name:
The Central Exchange, Torigo,
and Fons Maim notice boards...

rows.label: qst100406_msg0302
rows.name:
Please let me know when you've
put up all the flyers, mo!
